AdditionalComments: We are a 2-year training program in adult and pediatric A&I. There are two tracks: IM has 2 positions and pediatrics has 2 position each year. Cross training for IM fellows are 65% adult/35% pediatric and pediatric fellow is 65% pediatric/35% adult. We treat various diseases from immunodeficiency, asthma, anaphylaxis, drug allergy, food allergy, HAE, mastocytosis, venom allergy, and allergic rhinitis. There is an optional paid third year for those who would like to pursue a career in research.
